alert.note: Alert for Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 7:45AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Washington Parish, Walthall and northeastern Pike Counties through 830 AM CST... At 745 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dexter, or 12 miles south of Kokomo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklinton, Tylertown, Varnado, Salem, Dexter and Angie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
